Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small BckAlgebra Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small BckAlgebra AllSmallBckAlgebra is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic bckalgebra models from orders 2 to 7.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of BckAlgebra formulas(BckAlgebra).
((x*y)*(z*y))*(x*z) = 0.
x*x=0.
x*0=x.
((x*y=0) & (y*x=0)) -> x=y.
0*x=0.
(x*(x*y))*y=0.
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has no dependencies .
